name: The Bible Game (itch)
description:
the one and only bible game!
COLLECT THE 10 SECRET COINS HIDDEN THROUGHOUT THE GAME! 

(you will get absolutely nothing except the satisfaction of 100% the game! how fun!! )

I hope you enjoy it! even though it's stupid i did put a lot of effort into making this game so i hope you like it.

///IMPORTANT///
this game was created on and off for 2 years and i cant remember at all where I got the assets, If you notice I used your asset by  accident please contact me so I could credit you or remove it from the game
